resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

To begin the verification and synchronization process, you and your partner need to exchange QR codes, for this, give your partner the opportunity to scan your QR code. In order to scan the QR code of your partner, tap the \"scan\" button.
Your partner\'s public key can not be found, perhaps in front of you people who have not provided services to the community, you want to continue to give him a favor?
INTERNET access is required to display the INTERNET preview.
Permission is not available. Requesting INTERNET permission.
Camera access is required to display the camera preview.
Permission is not available. Requesting camera permission.
Your partner’s public key has been found.
Maximum age for storing public keys
The public keys of your partners on reaching this age (in days) will be automatically deleted from the local database
Maximum number of identifiers transmitted in one message between applications

In fact, this is the size of one message between applications, it is defined as follows: 20 bytes hash of the public key sum * this parameter. The number of messages is determined by the maximum storage age
